transcript:
with cannon, a cloud of smoke appeared, then a sec- ond and a third almost simultaneously, and at the moment when the first report was heard a fourth was seen. Then two reports one after another, and a third. 
"Oh! Ohl" groaned Nesvitski as if in fierce pain, seizing the officer of the suite by the arm. "Look! A man has fallen! Fallen, fallen!" 
"Two, I think." 
"If I were Tsar I would never go to war," said Nesvitski, turning away.
